Different Crime.Crime Name: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act Violation
state_protection: failed to conduct a proper state protection analysis
did not reference the legal test or presumption of state protection
reasonableness_of_decision: lacked transparent reasoning connecting evidence to conclusions
judicial_review_process: judicial review under subsection 72(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
assessed the RPD's reasoning and application of legal principles
decision_outcome: set aside for re-determination by a different panel
